sentences.english: Endoscopic ultrasonography and computerized tomography demonstrated the lesion to be a cyst in nature.
sentences.chinese: 内视镜超音波与电脑断层检查也证明此病灶为囊状物。

sentences.english: The diagnosis of this lesion was internal hemorrhoids based on sigmoidoscopy.
sentences.chinese: 由乙状结肠镜诊断此病灶为内痔。

sentences.english: The first failing, of which Mr Obama in particular is guilty, is misstating the problem.
sentences.chinese: 第一重失误就是谎报病灶，奥巴马难逃其咎。

sentences.english: Plasma cell granuloma is a rare tumor-like benign lesion of uncertain etiology.
sentences.chinese: 浆细胞肉芽肿是一种外表类似肿瘤的良性病灶。

sentences.english: A few dark blue inflammatory cells are scattered within the atheroma.
sentences.chinese: 一些暗蓝色的炎细胞散在分布于粥样硬化病灶内。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the characteristic features of postoperative epilepsy developed after excision of cerebral space-occupying lesion.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨大脑占位病灶切除术后患者继发癫的特点。

sentences.english: While repeatedly stimulating the side of self-control lesions.
sentences.chinese: 一边自我控制一边反复刺激病灶。

sentences.english: There was central homogeneous enhancement in 7 cases after intravenously administration of Gd -DTPA.
sentences.chinese: 增强扫描后，7例病灶中心有中等强化。

sentences.english: There were thick and round blood vessels of lung between the tumor and hilum.
sentences.chinese: 并见增粗迂曲的肺门血管与病灶相连。

sentences.english: In all these lesions with downward extension, the red nucleus was always spared.
sentences.chinese: 当病灶向下延伸时，红核常不受累。

sentences.english: Result Total resection was achieved in all of 7 cases without mortality and morbidity of complication.
sentences.chinese: 结果7例病灶均获全切除，预后良好，无手术死亡。

sentences.english: This would be most likely to happen in the case of PD .
sentences.chinese: 这将最有可能在进展病灶情况下发生。

sentences.english: Actually gives advocate hand of knife doctor instantly, help expose focus of a disease.
sentences.chinese: 实则给主刀医生当下手，帮忙暴露病灶。

sentences.english: It starts starves to tumors by blocking blood flow to the growths.
sentences.chinese: 他通过阻碍血液流入病灶来抑制肿瘤的生长。

sentences.english: The nidus was seen well in all patients.
sentences.chinese: 的病灶被视为在所有患者。

sentences.english: No evidence of infundibular enhancement is noted on either the coronal or the sagittal images.
sentences.chinese: 无论是矢状面还是冠状面都未见漏斗部异常强化病灶。

mediastinum (organs and tissues in the thorax between the lungs)
